about_the_game:
Discover a tranquil and unique puzzle experience with Checkers & Pawns, a game inspired by the classic games of checkers and chess. Perfect for casual players seeking a relaxing yet challenging experience, this game offers more than 50 levels in a minimalist and elegant environment.
In Checkers & Pawns, you control a white checker aiming to capture all the black pieces scattered across the board. The rules have been adapted to provide more dynamic and engaging gameplay. Prepare yourself to solve progressive puzzles.
The movement mechanics of the white checker are a unique blend of the rules of checkers and chess. You can capture black pieces by moving in any of the eight directions, not just diagonally, as in traditional checkers. Additionally, the white queen can capture pawns, a piece borrowed from chess, by moving to the square occupied by them in any adjacent direction.
With a well-balanced difficulty curve, Checkers & Pawns offers a captivating challenge for players of all skill levels. Each level features a different arrangement of black pieces, ensuring a unique and stimulating experience every time you play.

    Key features:
  • More than 50 challenging levels with variations in board layout and piece placement
  • Unique movement mechanics, combining the rules of checkers and chess
  • Minimalist and elegant environment for a relaxing experience
  • Well-balanced difficulty curve, suitable for casual players

Challenge your mind and unwind with Checkers & Pawns, the perfect puzzle for moments of tranquility. Buy now and enjoy this relaxing experience while exercising your mind.
